titleStmt.title: Lavv-trickes or, VVho vvould haue thought it As it hath bene diuers times acted by the Children of the Reuels. Written by Iohn Day.
Law tricks
titleStmt.author: Day, John, 1574-1640?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for Richard More, and are to be solde at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleete-streete,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Law-tricks, or who would haue thought it.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard in Fleete-streete
